doc:
Bobby Hosea https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Hosea 0 Bobby Hosea (born 1955) is an American film and television actor. He played O.J. Simpson in the Fox movie The O. J. Simpson Story. and John Allen Muhammad in D.C. Sniper: 23 Days of Fear. He is the head of Train 'Em Up Academy, Inc., and the creator of Dip-N-rip Sticks, 12-Step Tackle Training System. Bobby_Hosea ( born 1955 ) is an_American_film_and_television_actor . He played O.J._Simpson in the_Fox_movie The_O._J._Simpson_Story . and John_Allen_Muhammad in D.C._Sniper : 23_Days of Fear . He is the_head of Train_'Em Up Academy , Inc. , and the_creator of Dip-N-rip_Sticks , 12-Step_Tackle_Training_System .
